tool.name: OGS: reviseMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'reviseMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $input_mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; reviseMesh #if str($min_ele_dim).strip() != 'None' and str($min_ele_dim).strip() != '': --min-ele-dim '$min_ele_dim' #end if #if str($eps).strip() != 'None' and str($eps).strip() != '': --eps '$eps' #end if --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu

param.name: min_ele_dim
param.label: min ele dim
param.help: Minimum dimension of elements to be inserted into new mesh

param.name: eps
param.label: eps
param.help: Minimum distance for nodes not to be collapsed

tool.help: This tool runs the **reviseMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
